name: Special Muggy Ball

trigger.text: Return 1 character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand.

text: Main: Your opponent returns 1 of their characters with a cost of 6 or less to the owner's hand. Trigger: Return 1 character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand.
